name: Regicide (AJTech2002)
description:
Regicide is a game about a lone assassin that sneaks through the dark dungeons of evil monarch's castle's in order to reach their royally corrupt thrones and take them out for the good of the kingdom. The game features 3 levels and in each you play as the assassin armed with nothing but a knife and your wits you will need to either sneak past or take out the enemies in your path to reach the king and commit regicide.

Instructions

  • Move around the scene
  • Sneak around enemies 
  • Use Torches to increase your view
  • Pickup Keys and Unlock Doors
  • Kill enemies by backstabbing them
  • Find & Exterminate the King

Controls

  • WASD : MOVEMENT
  • Mouse : LOOK AROUND
  • Shift: SNEAK (Quiet)
  • Left Mouse Button : ATTACK
  • Space : ZOOM OUT (but no movement allowed)
